file.name: rt-document-position.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
components:
  schemas:

    DocumentPositionResult:
      title: "Document Position"
      description: "Contains information about document position on the input image, its center, angle, etc"
      allOf:
        - type: object
          properties:
            DocumentPosition:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/DocumentPosition"
        - $ref: './rt.yml#/components/schemas/ResultItem'

    DocumentPosition:
      type: object
      properties:
        docFormat:
          $ref: "./rt-doc-type-old.yml#/components/schemas/DocumentFormat"
        Angle:
          type: number
        Width:
          type: integer
        Height:
          type: integer
        Center:
          $ref: './common.yml#/components/schemas/Point'
        LeftBottom:
          $ref: './common.yml#/components/schemas/Point'
        LeftTop:
          $ref: './common.yml#/components/schemas/Point'
        RightBottom:
          $ref: './common.yml#/components/schemas/Point'
        RightTop:
          $ref: './common.yml#/components/schemas/Point'
        Dpi:
          type: integer

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: schemas: "DocumentPositionResult": parse schema: allOf: [0]: parse schema: property "DocumentPosition": parse schema: resolve "#/components/schemas/DocumentPosition": parse schema: property "Center": parse schema: resolve "./common.yml#/components/schemas/Point": external "./common.yml": file: local file reference is not allowed
